comments: She was really helpful. Class would end early and she would gladly stay after to help anyone who had questions. All work is done from notes and homework given out from her. She gives a sheet with extra problems out of the book, besides that it\'s useless. Tests are straight forward and quizzes are all multiple choice!
Was easy. Had a take home quiz and test. Final was a breeze, but it is one the school has written. She is pretty easy going and will go over any problem again just to make sure you know it.

She\'s great and lots of fun. Almost acts like a mom and doesn\'t take things too seriously. Homework, example, problems, discuss the chapter, and go home. Fairly simple. Quizzes and tests reflected the homework and was a breeze.

SHES GREAT. i suck at math .she made the material fun and easy to understand. she isnt the most helpful person.like if you have questions on the HW your better off going to SAGE. lots of group problems and quizes and my class got 2 take home test.

I\'ve heard that If you\'re an older adult going back to school, she is for you. I\'ve heard that she not the most helpful but has easy tests and lets you leave early. If she is teaching MAT095 this summer, I plan to request her. I will follow up after I have her in class to let you know more information.
